title: Watch Face Scoon Tech1
summary: A complex animated watchface with futuristic design.The ultimate tech watch face
description: High Definition and high frame rate futuristic watch face with weather, power indicators and more. The first watch face in the world where you can change the color of the complex animation!Highly customizable and brilliant design for ANDROID WEAR 5.0 and later.-Background animation hue is user customizable.- Analog Hands can be toggled on or off and the hue is user customizable.- Digital time can be 24hr or 12hr and the hue is user customizable.- Weather can be toggled on or off.The color can be chosen with a color picker. Update interval can be customized. - Phone and Watch battery indicators can be toggled on or off. The color can be chosen with a color picker.- Date can be toggled on or off and the color can be chosen with a color picker.
descriptionHTML:
High Definition and high frame rate futuristic watch face with weather, power indicators and more. The first watch face in the world where you can change the color of the complex animation!
Highly customizable and brilliant design for ANDROID WEAR 5.0 and later.

-Background animation hue is user customizable.
- Analog Hands can be toggled on or off and the hue is user customizable.
- Digital time can be 24hr or 12hr and the hue is user customizable.
- Weather can be toggled on or off.The color can be chosen with a color picker. Update interval can be customized.
- Phone and Watch battery indicators can be toggled on or off. The color can be chosen with a color picker.
- Date can be toggled on or off and the color can be chosen with a color picker.
comments: I like how this looks on my SW3. And I am happy to have a watch face that shows me the temperature. I turned off the animation. But I wish I could turn off modules, or at least change the date format and turn off the labels - they're kind of dorky ("atomic").  It doesn't look as smooth as stock faces in ambient mode, but pretty good, which is what I see most because I use 'always on'. I would like this more if the 4 lines that remain across the screen went away in ambient mode.
B-e-utiful design.  Just makes one compatible for Tic watch. Not much but I'll donate $5 USD?
Add steps on watch and then 5 Starsâ˜º
Issue with weather Not retrieving correct weather( displayed as 238608275 Celsius). GPS is enabled...It's resolved thanks
recentChanges: -Changed the weather provider url to provide more consistent weather updates.
-Added leading zero toggle for the Digital Time
-Added toggle to turn off digital time
-Added digital time options to on-watch settings
-Added city code to Manual Weather Location settings and a reference for all available city codes.
